Get Started with NextWork

Ready to transform your learning journey? Enter your email to get started.

Shape the Future of Learning

Join our mission to transform careers through personalized, project-based learning. Help us create educational experiences that unlock human potential and drive meaningful change.

Our Culture

At NextWork, we believe that great products come from great people. We've built a culture that values curiosity, collaboration, and continuous learning— the same principles we bring to our educational platform.

Learning-First Mindset

We practice what we preach—continuous learning and growth are core to who we are.

Remote-First, Global Team

Work from anywhere while collaborating with talented people across the globe.

Impact-Driven Work

Every project directly contributes to transforming lives and careers.

Benefits & Perks

We take care of our team so they can focus on their best work

Health & Wellness

  • • Comprehensive health insurance
  • • Mental health support
  • • Wellness stipend ($500/year)
  • • Flexible time off policy

Learning & Growth

  • • $2000 learning budget per year
  • • Conference attendance support
  • • Internal learning sessions
  • • Career development planning

Work-Life Balance

  • • Flexible working hours
  • • Remote work options
  • • 4-day work week trial
  • • No-meeting Fridays

Financial Benefits

  • • Competitive salary + equity
  • • 401(k) with company match
  • • Annual bonus program
  • • Stock option program

Equipment & Setup

  • • Latest MacBook Pro + accessories
  • • $1000 home office stipend
  • • Co-working space membership
  • • High-speed internet allowance

Team & Culture

  • • Annual team retreats
  • • Monthly team building events
  • • Diverse and inclusive environment
  • • Open communication culture

Open Positions

Join our team and help transform the future of learning

Senior Frontend Developer

Full-time Remote

Build the user experience that transforms how people learn. Work with React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies to create engaging learning interfaces.

React TypeScript Next.js Tailwind CSS
Posted 2 days ago • Engineering

Learning Experience Designer

Full-time Remote

Design and create project-based learning experiences that transform careers. Work with educators, developers, and learners to craft engaging curricula.

Curriculum Design Learning Science UX Design
Posted 1 week ago • Product

Product Marketing Manager

Full-time Hybrid

Drive growth and adoption of NextWork's learning platform. Create compelling messaging, launch new features, and build our community of learners.

Product Marketing Growth Content Strategy
Posted 3 days ago • Marketing

Don't See Your Role?

We're always looking for talented people to join our mission. Send us your resume and tell us how you'd like to contribute to transforming education.

Our Application Process

Designed to be thorough, fair, and respectful of your time

1

Application

Submit your application with resume and cover letter

2

Initial Screen

30-minute conversation with our talent team

3

Team Interviews

Meet with team members and hiring manager

4

Final Decision

Reference checks and offer (usually within 1 week)

What Our Team Says

Hear from the people who make NextWork an amazing place to work

Alex Kim

Senior Frontend Developer

"Working at NextWork feels like being part of something bigger. Every feature we build directly impacts people's careers and lives. The learning culture here is incredible."

Maria Santos

Learning Experience Designer

"The flexibility and trust here is amazing. I can work when I'm most productive, and the team supports each other's growth both professionally and personally."

Jordan Taylor

Product Manager

"NextWork challenges me every day while providing the support to grow. The mission-driven culture and innovative approach make this the best role I've had."
